review: Works well, but the interface is a little confusing at first, and the lineup doesn't currently stretch very far beyond Amazon's own services and Netflix.  But, in fairness, this is to be expected. The thing just launched, and I think it has tremendous potential as adoption grows.One thing it misses is sling abilities.  For example, I can't use Netflix on my phone and then select the Fire Stick as the playback device.  I have to use the app on the stick to browse and then play.  Not a big deal?  Would you rather "search" with a remote than your mobile?  Nope, typing is slow and clumsy.And Amazon Prime Music is kind of a mess.  You can't even search for music on the stick.  You have to search it out online and then add it to your library before you can play it on the Fire Stick.  And while selection is good for an addon service, it pales compared to Google Play Music or Spotify.One bright light -- the native TuneIn app is fantastic.  This brought radio back to my house.All that said, I was an early adopter and these are expected imperfections for a brand new product.  Overall, this shows great promise, and I'm pleased with the purchase.
author: xm-s

review: The Fire Stick was easy to install and works well, but I was disappointed that so many of the movie choices require additional purchases. My impression had been that the free offerings under Amazon Prime would be exhaustive, but that is not the case.
author: Jim59

review: I have a Kindle account in the UK and an Amazon.com Prime account in the US.  Apparently this makes it impossible for me to use my US bought Fire stick in the US, as it thinks I am in the UK.  So far (one week later), Amazon technical department have been unable to resolve this.  I will return the stick as useless.
author: Barbaros

review: Turned my tv into a smart tv, practically. I refuse to pay for cable ever again! Plus, as a Prime customer and kindle fire HDX owner, an entire new world of possibilities opened up with streaming and screen mirroring. Highly recommended!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love that I don't have to fire up my PS3 every time I want to watch to watch Amazon Prime or Netflix. I don't like so much how slow this thing is. Responsiveness is lacking.

review: Works well. Hoping to use this as first stepping stone to eliminate way too expensive cable.
